metadata.synopsis: Orin, Chosen of Bhaal resides in Bhaal Temple, waiting for the players to arrive. She has given them an ultimatum to kill Gortash and retrieve his Netherstone for her, or the players' abducted companion will be sacrified.  If the players didn't have a valid companion for kidnapping, a random citizen will take the place of sacrifice.Orin has multiple reactivity to the player's previous actions.- was Orin attacked during her Impersonations several times?- are players Unholy Assassins?- did/didn't players kill Gortash?- are players DarkUrge?- did Orin kidnap a romance partner, friend or random citizen?- did players kill Sarevok?- was Orin warned of the players coming and therefore kills the victim immediately?Regardless of the various player choices, Orin will eventually begin a fight with the players, determined to prove to Bhaal and herself that she is a worthy Chosen of Bhaal.If players had rejected the Dark Urge earlier, she will turn into the Slayer before combat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 0) Start with Dark Urge Origin1) With the debugbook, go to Act 3 -> Undercity -> Bhaal Temple -> Bhaal Temple Bridge.2) oe BTSetKilledGortash for Gortash killed3) oe BTUnholyAssassin for Unholy Assassin title.4) oe BTSetKilledSarevok for Sarevok killed.5) oe BTSetWarnedOrin for Orin was warned. If you set this, as you approach Orin, she will kill the victim first before you can talk to her.6) Go into the Bhaal Temple and trigger conversation with Orin.

82.speaker: Orin
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player approaches, seeing their unconcious companion on the altar. Orin 'transports' herself to the altar, tipping the companion's lolling head as though making them watch the player's approach. She leans over them, confiding. NodeContext: Hushed, as though to companion on altar, but really for player's benefit. Mocking reassurance

53.speaker: Orin
53.text: See how it crawls towards us. Not a dream now. No, no. It is blood and bone. Carrying the tyrant's rock.
53.context: NodeContext: Hushed, as though to companion on altar, but really for player's benefit. Mocking reassurance. 'It' is player. 'Tyrant's rock' is netherstone she asked you to bring.

48.speaker: Orin
48.text: But Sarevok's crimson was not yours to spill. He was mine. You had no right to take him.
48.context: NodeContext: A vicious but contained grief - she's genuinely disturbed by his death, but this isn't a feeling she's had before, so she's suppressing it.

14.speaker: Orin
14.text: I said I'd leave the blood inside. But it smells sweet, and the blade was made to slice...
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin grabs the companion's head again, She draws her daggers, placing the tip of one blade at their exposed throat. A drop of blood trickles down.NodeContext: Fighting temptation to just kill the victim anyway, trying to stress the player out

37.text: Gortash is dead. Gale is not yours to kill.
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Blunt - never really cared about killing the victim

44.speaker: Orin
44.text: Gortash is dead. Gale is not yours to kill.
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Blunt - never really cared about killing the victim

38.text: Gortash is dead. Halsin is not yours to kill.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Blunt - never really cared about killing the victim

68.text: Gortash is dead. Lae'zel is not yours to kill.
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Blunt - never really cared about killing the victim

24.speaker: Orin
24.text: Gortash is dead. Minthara is not yours to kill.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Blunt - never really cared about killing the victim

178.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Blunt - never really cared about killing the victim

113.speaker: Orin
113.text: Gortash is dead. Yenna is not yours to kill.
113.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Smug, excited by the thought

173.speaker: Orin
173.text: What have you done to him?
173.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Smug, excited by the thought

72.speaker: Orin
72.text: What have you done to her?
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Smug, excited by the thought

83.speaker: Orin
83.text: Nothing! Not a hair out of place. But when we're through, I'll dress your corpse in its skin.
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Smug, excited by the thought

95.speaker: Orin
95.text: Harm him now, and I will inflict every agony on you tenfold.
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Exagerrated exasperation - the player using words to threaten her instead of violence is proof of how pathetic they are

20.speaker: Orin
20.text: Still, it thinks it has control. Flapping its lips, squealing like a lamb on the spit.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Exagerrated exasperation - the player using words to threaten her instead of violence is proof of how pathetic they are

158.text: You still don't remember, do you, blood kin?
158.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin begins to approach the player, her steps slow and measured. The player watches, wary.NodeContext: Smug, holding power over the player - about to reveal the truth

73.speaker: Orin
73.text: You still don't remember, do you, blood kin?
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin begins to approach the player, her steps slow and measured. The player watches, wary.NodeContext: Smug, holding power over the player - about to reveal the truth

135.speaker: Narrator
135.text: How you screamed as my knife slit your skull, your brain juices sticky and sweet.
135.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] As she walks, Orin transforms into the player, her head turned to one side. As she looks back to the player, we see blood pour down one side of her face,NodeContext:  [Rerecord note] Please ask audio engineer for reference file

Recalling a pleasing memory

51.text: A little hole, big enough for the worm, your body a blood sack to feed it.
51.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin keeps walking slowly towards the player. She holds out a tadpole on the palm of her hand, and then clenches her fist, crushing the tadpole on the last wordNodeContext:  [Rerecord note] Please ask audio engineer for reference file

Recalling a pleasing memory. Describing inserting the tadpole into your brain

99.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin approches, leans in close to the player and speaks the last words softly, before turning back into her normal form.NodeContext:  [Rerecord note] Please ask audio engineer for reference file

Giggling, proud - Recalling a pleasing memory

59.text: *A straggling memory rises: The day your tyranny should have engulfed this world, it was you who were the first to be enslaved.*
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: It feels as if the Urge is really surfacing in the player at this point

23.speaker: Narrator
23.text: *A straggling memory rises: The day your tyranny should have engulfed this world, it was you who were the first to be enslaved.*
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: It feels as if the Urge is really surfacing in the player at this point

149.speaker: Narrator
149.text: *Orin's smile was the last thing you saw, her bright blade glinting as she chiselled into your skull. Her reckless digging left your mind shattered.*
149.context: CinematicNodeContext: It feels as if the Urge is really surfacing in the player at this point

94.speaker: Narrator
94.text: *She robbed you of your bloody birthright, reduced you to nothing. Nothing but pure hate, and now it burns, yearning for vengeance.*
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: It feels as if the Urge is really surfacing in the player at this point

141.speaker: Orin
141.text: Husk. Maggot. A Bhaalspawn, slip-sliding in filth with these pigs. You don't deserve the Murder Lord's blessing.
141.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Now returned to her own form, Orin speaks very softly in the player's ear. The player adopts a defensive stance, meeting Orin's stare. After a tense moment, she steps back and smiles.NodeContext: 'Husk and maggot' are insults. 'Bhaalspawn' is a good thing to be, that the player is demeaning with their behaviour. Murder Lord's blessing refers to being the slayer/chosen. 'Pigs' refers to the victim/companions/anyone who doesn't worship Bhaal

93.speaker: Orin
93.text: That's rich, coming from you. Your grandfather Sarevok is your father, and he ordered your mother to kill you. You come from a cesspit of liars.
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pauses, for a moment dumbstruck. Her focus is now fully on the player. This has hit a nerveNodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

122.speaker: Orin
122.text: No no NO NO NO! He didn't. He didn't... Filthy, pig-mouthed little LIAR!
122.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pauses, for a moment dumbstruck. Her focus is now fully on the player. This has hit a nerveNodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

133.speaker: Orin
133.text: Grandfather loved me. He worshipped me. These petty smearings will not save you.
133.context: NodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

25.speaker: Orin
25.text: Grandfather loves me. He worships me. How dare you smear his name. It will not save you.
25.context: NodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

76.speaker: Orin
76.text: You're pathetic. No wonder he tricked you so easily.
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin freezes for a moment. This can't be true. NodeContext: Genuine doubt creeping in. This is breaking every truth she believes about herself and her purpose.

176.speaker: Orin
176.text: Sarevok told me the truth himself. He was laughing at you.
176.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin freezes for a moment. This can't be true. NodeContext: Genuine doubt creeping in. This is breaking every truth she believes about herself and her purpose.

30.text: No. Not him. Not him... I did all this for him. Everything... everything...
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin freezes for a moment. This can't be true. NodeContext: Genuine doubt creeping in. This is breaking every truth she believes about herself and her purpose.

15.speaker: Orin
15.text: No. Not him. Not him... I did all this for him. Everything... everything...
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin freezes for a moment. This can't be true. NodeContext: Genuine doubt creeping in. This is breaking every truth she believes about herself and her purpose.

167.speaker: Bhaal Avatar
167.text: No, Orin. You did this for me.
167.context: CinematicNodeContext: An unseen voice speak out. Orin begins to jerk, her face contorted. She (involuntarily) transforms into the slayer.NodeContext: Unseen. Commanding. Condemning.

28.speaker: Orin
28.text: Bhaal... Father, they lie to me. They lie!
28.context: NodeContext: reacting to hearing Bhaal's voice in the temple. Almost childlke, she can't handle this

96.speaker: Bhaal Avatar
96.text: You hesitate. If you will not fight for my blessing, I will make you something crueller. A deserving sacrifice for my child's ascension.
96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin looks fearful as her body begins to bend and contort against her will. Bhaal is seizing her form, turning it to his purpose - the ultimate betrayal. She (involuntarily) transforms into the slayer.NodeContext: Unseen. Commanding. Condemning.Turning Orin into the slayer.

52.speaker: Bhaal Avatar
52.text: Hush, child. No more doubts, no more fears, no more Orin. Become murder.
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Above the temple, the eyes of Bhaal's skull glow red. Orin begins to jerk, her face contorted. She (involuntarily) transforms into the slayer.NodeContext: Unseen. Commanding. Condemning.Turning Orin into the slayer.

172.speaker: Orin
172.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin transforms into the slayerNodeContext: Slayer roars

103.speaker: Orin
103.text: He's your father, Orin. He abused your mother. He abused you.
103.context: NodeContext: Vicious, rejecting everything the player is saying

39.speaker: Orin
39.text: Bhaal rejoices in such cruel betrayals. You really believed you were the exception?
39.context: NodeContext: Vicious, rejecting everything the player is saying

144.speaker: Orin
144.context: NodeContext: Vicious, rejecting everything the player is saying

148.context: NodeContext: Vicious, rejecting everything the player is saying

161.speaker: Orin
161.context: NodeContext: Vicious, rejecting everything the player is saying

126.speaker: Orin
126.text: Your skin will be grandfather's shroud, coward. I will flay you where you stand.

146.speaker: Orin
146.text: Your skin will be grandfather's shroud, coward. I will flay you where you stand.
146.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin draws her blades, ready for combat. She smiles.NodeContext: Threatening/eyes shining. Energized. Combat about to begin.

60.speaker: Orin
60.text: Do you plan to duel me with such weakling words? I promise, mine are sharper.

80.context: NodeContext: Dismissive, riled up. Getting ready to attack the player

124.speaker: Orin
124.text: You hold no threat for me. Nor do your petty little vapours.
124.context: NodeContext: Dismissive, riled up. Getting ready to attack the player

145.speaker: Orin
145.text: I deserve it more than you. Sarevok ordered your mother to kill you. You weren't even meant to survive.
145.context: NodeContext: Fury, a personal haterd coming through. 'Grandfather' is Sarevok - this is the claim she thinks makes her superior to you. A stolen birthright.

112.speaker: Orin
112.text: That's rich, coming from you. You're the child of a father and his daughter. Your mother was Sarevok's daughter.
112.context: NodeContext: Fury, a personal haterd coming through. 'Grandfather' is Sarevok - this is the claim she thinks makes her superior to you. A stolen birthright.

84.speaker: Orin
84.text: Your foul bloodline ends here. You'll rot with your grandfather.
84.context: NodeContext: Fury, a personal haterd coming through. 'Grandfather' is Sarevok - this is the claim she thinks makes her superior to you. A stolen birthright.

64.speaker: Orin
64.context: NodeContext: Fury, a personal haterd coming through. 'Grandfather' is Sarevok - this is the claim she thinks makes her superior to you. A stolen birthright.

150.speaker: Orin
150.text: My grandfather ruled this city. A slaughterhouse ripened for my blades, and you stole it.
150.context: NodeContext: Fury, a personal haterd coming through. 'Grandfather' is Sarevok - this is the claim she thinks makes her superior to you. A stolen birthright.

169.speaker: Orin
169.text: Enough enough ENOUGH! The runt must be culled.
169.context: NodeContext: Calming herself down after getting worked up. Knows what she needs to do. 'The runt' refers to the player.

117.speaker: Orin
117.text: Forget Bhaal. It's your Netherstone I've come for.
117.context: InternalNodeContext: I like to imagine Orin tried to resist him onceNodeContext: I like to imagine Orin tried to resist him once - disregard if unhelpful. 'Father' is Bhaal. Referring to her hearing Bhaal's voice - real or imagined, we don't know. Finding purpose by the end - knows what needs to be done.

127.speaker: Orin
127.text: None can resist Father's blessing. He tells me, whisper quiet. The lies must be cut from your throat.
127.context: InternalNodeContext: I like to imagine Orin tried to resist him onceNodeContext: I like to imagine Orin tried to resist him once - disregard if unhelpful. 'Father' is Bhaal. Referring to her hearing Bhaal's voice - real or imagined, we don't know. Finding purpose by the end - knows what needs to be done.

136.speaker: Orin
136.text: I don't want Bhaal's blessing. I will not fight you for it.
136.context: NodeContext: Fury - you're not playing by the rules. Refusing to fight means she will never prove herself, never be loved. 'Murder Lord' is Bhaal

2.speaker: Orin
2.text: No! The Murder Lord demands one. Only one. It is me. It must be me.
2.context: NodeContext: Fury - you're not playing by the rules. Refusing to fight means she will never prove herself, never be loved. 'Murder Lord' is Bhaal

89.speaker: Orin
89.text: Come close, my Death's Heads, but keep your blades unblooded. Bhaal demands a duel.
89.context: NodeContext: Commanding, but also getting more worked up/excited. Important info - reiterating the terms of the combat for the player (must be a 1:1 duel)

79.speaker: Orin
79.text: He wants to taste my domination. An altar flowing with his own unwilling flesh. Draining, dying, drip, drip, drip.
79.context: NodeContext: Anticipating. 'He' is Bhaal. 'Own flesh' because the player is a direct descendent of Bhaal.

101.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
101.text: The changeling stands no chance, fiendish one. Eviscerate her!
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin draws her blades, ready for combat. She smiles.NodeContext: Threatening/eyes shining. Combat about to begin.

9.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
9.text: The changeling stands no chance, fiendish one. Eviscerate her!
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin draws her blades, ready for combat. She smiles.NodeContext: Threatening/eyes shining. Combat about to begin.

111.speaker: Orin
111.text: The Murder Lord's blessing will be mine, once I peel the skin from your carcass.
111.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin draws her blades, ready for combat. She smiles.NodeContext: Threatening/eyes shining. Combat about to begin.

174.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
174.text: You should have trained harder, Master.

152.speaker: Orin
152.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin transforms into the slayerNodeContext: Slayer roars

179.speaker: Orin
179.text: He already made me his Slayer. I will be his Chosen.
179.context: NodeContext: Vicious, angry - hates to hear anything referring to the player's relationhsip to Bhaal

171.speaker: Orin
171.text: It opens its lips and spews filthy lies. No no NO!
171.context: NodeContext: Vicious, angry - hates to hear anything referring to the player's relationhsip to Bhaal

119.speaker: Orin
119.text: Bhaal has not decided. First our blades must carve and slice. The runt must be culled, the flesh offered.
119.context: NodeContext: Desperately wants to believe this - Bhaal already gave the player a token of his favour, she's on the back foot. A desperate plan.  'The runt' is the player.

114.text: Usurper. When I reclaim my rightful place, you'll see the power I hold.
114.context: NodeContext: lashing out, angry - defiant. 'How dare you.'

130.speaker: Orin
130.text: Your rightful place is strung above my altar, carcass fluids flooding into the gutter.
130.context: NodeContext: lashing out, angry - defiant. 'How dare you.'

116.text: Show Orin the splendour of Bhaal's favourite: Call upon the Slayer.
116.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player transforms into the slayer - a terrifying sight. This is their crowning moment - taking on the form Bhaal gifted them in his very temple.

107.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player transforms into the slayer - a terrifying sight. This is their crowning moment - taking on the form Bhaal gifted them in his very temple.

22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin draws her blades, ready for combat. She smiles. The player-as-slayer ROARS.

66.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player draws their weapon/adopts a fighting stance.

81.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player draws their weapon/adopts a fighting stance.

125.speaker: Narrator
125.text: *This is the truth you had forgotten: you were the favourite, the Chosen - Orin was your subordinate.*
125.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player closes their eyes, jaw clenched. They remember.

49.speaker: Narrator
49.text: *You led the cultists of Bhaal and orchestrated the Absolute plot. It was your genius, your cruelty, your design.*
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player closes their eyes, jaw clenched. They remember.

139.speaker: Narrator
139.text: *At your moment of greatest triumph - when all the pieces were in place - she betrayed you, infected you, and took your place.*
139.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player closes their eyes, jaw clenched. They remember.

134.speaker: Orin
134.text: Harm her now, and I will inflict every agony on you tenfold.
134.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin raises her duel daggers  high and SLAMS them into the victim's skull, one through each eye. The victim opens their mouth, splutters and dies.  Orin drags her blades free, smiles, and leaps from the altar.

35.speaker: Orin
35.text: Kill him. He is nothing to me.
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin raises her duel daggers  high and SLAMS them into the victim's skull, one through each eye. The victim opens their mouth, splutters and dies.  Orin drags her blades free, smiles, and leaps from the altar.

19.text: Kill her. She is nothing to me.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin raises her duel daggers  high and SLAMS them into the victim's skull, one through each eye. The victim opens their mouth, splutters and dies.  Orin drags her blades free, smiles, and leaps from the altar.

1.text: Do you remember now, blood kin?
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin raises her duel daggers  high and SLAMS them into the victim's skull, one through each eye. The victim opens their mouth, splutters and dies.  Orin drags her blades free, smiles, and leaps from the altar.

75.speaker: Orin
75.text: Do you remember now, blood kin?
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin begins to approach the player, her steps slow and measured. The player watches, wary.NodeContext: Breathless, panting from killing the companion. Smug, holding power over the player - about to reveal the truth

131.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin raises her duel daggers  high and SLAMS them into Yenna's skull, one through each eye - we look away, seeing the player's horrified reaction. Orin drags her blades free, giggling.

8.speaker: Orin
8.text: But you did not listen. Thought my instructions could be ignored. I told you what to do, whelp worm, and you disobeyed.
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin leans over the player's companion on their altar, admires their form. She draws her daggers, places the tip of one blade at the abductee's exposed throat.NodeContext: Whispered to the comapnion on the altar, but intended for the player. She's been punished for her own disobedience countless times before, and enjoys doling this out to others.

54.speaker: Orin
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin leans over the player's companion on their altar, admires their form. She draws her daggers, places the tip of one blade at the abductee's exposed throat.NodeContext: Whispered to the comapnion on the altar, but intended for the player. She's been punished for her own disobedience countless times before, and enjoys doling this out to others.

92.speaker: Orin
92.text: Shh, shh, your saviour approaches, scuttling in without the tyrant's rock.
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player approaches as Orin transports herself to the altar. She whispers to the altar victim, who appears to be lying in a restful sleep, unharmed.NodeContext: Hushed, as though to companion on altar, but really for player's benefit. Mocking disappointment - the player didn't fulfil Orin's ultimatum

29.speaker: Orin
29.text: It lied to us. Ignored Father's commands.
29.context: NodeContext: Hushed, as though to companion on altar, but really for player's benefit. Feigning upset, but you've onlyconfirmed what she already thought - you're unworthy. 'Father' is Bhaal.

16.speaker: Orin
16.text: You are a mangled blood brain, thinking Father could be refused.

32.speaker: Orin
32.text: I know what you did. Spilled my grandfather's crimson... He was mine. He showed me the way, how to slice and slit. He guides my daggers still.
32.context: NodeContext: A vicious but contained grief - she's genuinely disturbed by his death, but this isn't a feeling she's had before, so she's suppressing it.

105.speaker: Orin
105.text: Did it think it could protect? Did it think it could save? Only the blades can offer salvation.
105.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin leans over the player's companion on their altar, admires their form. She draws her daggers, places the tip of one blade at the abductee's exposed throat.NodeContext: Hushed, as though to companion on altar, but really for player's benefit. Mocking player's intentions. On  the cusp of killing the victim. 'It' is player.

40.speaker: Orin
40.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? Attacked by your mother on Sarevok's orders. That must have hurt.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin releases the altar victim and leaps down (reuse of existing moment)

151.speaker: Orin
151.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? Attacked by your mother on Sarevok's orders. That must have hurt.

123.speaker: Orin
